word: A Tender Plant to Be Cultivated and Cherished. --Love is a tender plant, and it must be cultivated and cherished, and the roots of bitterness all have to be plucked up around it in order for it to have room to circulate, and then it will bring in under its influence all the powers of the mind, all the heart, so that we shall love God supremely and our neighbor as ourselves.--MS 50, 1894. (HC 173.)
